preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 30.0 g of Chromium(III) oxide, 40.0 g of Gadolinium(III) oxide, and 30.0 g of Neodymium(III) oxide using an analytical balance.  
 2. Place all powdered oxides in a clean, dry ceramic or glass mixing bowl.  
 3. Use a spatula to mix the powders thoroughly until a uniform color is achieved, indicating homogeneity.
